mapper.select: select B.id as blogId, B.title as blogTitle, B.blog_author_id as blogAuthorId, A.id as authorId, A.username as authorUsername, A.password as authorPassword, A.email as authorEmail, A.bio as authorBio, A.favourite_section as authorFavouriteSection, P.id as postId, P.blog_id as postBlogId, P.post_author_id as postAuthorId, P.created_on as postCreatedOn, P.section as postSection, P.subject as postSubject, P.draft as draft, P.body as postBody, C.id as cmtId, C.post_id as cmtPostId, C.name as cmtName, C.cmt as cmtCmt, T.id as tagId, T.name as tagName from Blog B left outer join Author A on B.blog_author_id = A.id left outer join Post P on B.id = P.blog_id left outer join Cmt C on P.id = C.post_id left outer join Tag T on P.id = T.post_id where B.id = #{id}
